name: Trapped in a Whole
description:
You play as an astronaut who was sucked into a wormhole. Your main goal is to return to home dimension. Join us to find the way through wormholes and get home, while trying to play with time and relative dimension in space...

! Unfortunately last update broke WebGL so we hope you will download !

Game is made for the Brackeys Jam 3 in 1 week! (Theme: "Holes")

All the visuals, sounds and scripts are made in this week.

Thanks to all contributors. Those people are awesome!

@TonyPixels-> Amazing pixel arts

@hunterstroud-> Epic musics and ambients (also spits)

@shad& @Inle -> Masterminds of our game's design

@me & @Ilushkins -> 1k Lines of code per day
